verses.verse: And the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me came again <S%H7725><s%>, and waked <S%H5782><s%> me, as a man <S%H376><s%> that is wakened <S%H5782><s%> out of his sleep <S%H8142><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> unto me, What seest <S%H7200><s%> thou? And I said <S%H559><s%>, I have looked <S%H7200><s%>, and behold a candlestick <S%H4501><s%> all of gold <S%H2091><s%>, with a bowl <S%H1531><s%> upon the top <S%H7218><s%> of it, and his seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereon, and seven <S%H7651><s%> pipes <S%H4166><s%> to the seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%>, which are upon the top <S%H7218><s%> thereof: a bowl: Heb. her bowl seven pipes: or, seven several pipes to the lamps

And two <S%H8147><s%> olive trees <S%H2132><s%> by it, one <S%H259><s%> upon the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the bowl <S%H1543><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> upon the left <S%H8040><s%> side thereof.
So I answered <S%H6030><s%> and spake <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, saying <S%H559><s%>, What are these, my lord <S%H113><s%>?

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not what these be? And I said <S%H559><s%>, No, my lord <S%H113><s%>.

Then he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spake <S%H559><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Not by might <S%H2428><s%>, nor by power <S%H3581><s%>, but by my spirit <S%H7307><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>. might: or, army

Who art thou, O great <S%H1419><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>? before <S%H6440><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> thou shalt become a plain <S%H4334><s%>: and he shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the headstone <S%H68><s%> <S%H7222><s%> thereof with shoutings <S%H8663><s%>, crying, Grace <S%H2580><s%>, grace <S%H2580><s%> unto it.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

The hands <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> have laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of this house <S%H1004><s%>; his hands <S%H3027><s%> shall also finish <S%H1214><s%> it; and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto you.

For who hath despised <S%H936><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of small things <S%H6996><s%>? for they shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, and shall see <S%H7200><s%> the plummet <S%H68><s%> <S%H913><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> with those seven <S%H7651><s%>; they are the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which run to and fro <S%H7751><s%> through the whole earth <S%H776><s%>. for they: or, since the seven eyes of the Lord shall rejoice plummet: Heb. stone of tin

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> I, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What are these two <S%H8147><s%> olive trees <S%H2132><s%> upon the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> and upon the left <S%H8040><s%> side thereof?

And I answered <S%H6030><s%> again <S%H8145><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What be these two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> branches <S%H7641><s%> which through <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> pipes <S%H6804><s%> empty <S%H7324><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> oil out of themselves? through: Heb. by the hand empty: or, empty out of themselves oil into the gold the golden oil: Heb. the gold
And he answered <S%H559><s%> me and said <S%H559><s%>, Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not what these be? And I said <S%H559><s%>, No, my lord <S%H113><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he, These are the two <S%H8147><s%> anointed <S%H3323><s%> ones <S%H1121><s%>, that stand <S%H5975><s%> by the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>. anointed: Heb. sons of oil
